pages.text: With a suitable Electrolyzer setup and a Singularity, large amounts of energy can be turned through Quantum Hawnking Radiation,  into Universally Useable Matter also known as UU Matter, the very fabric of the universe.
With 100 mB of UU Matter, the replicator can duplicate (almost) any item in the game!$(br2)Congratulations, it is now Yourcraft. Thanks for playing Modern Industrialization.
